user_query: I want to invest in the stock market and I'm looking for information on tech companies. Can you provide me with the latest stock market data for companies listed on the QuantaEx exchange? Additionally, I'm curious about the official open and close prices for Qualcomm stock. Furthermore, I would like to know the effective spread and short interest list for Microsoft stock.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest stock market data for companies listed on the QuantaEx exchange.
Retrieve the official open and close prices for Qualcomm stock.
Get the effective spread for Microsoft stock.
Obtain the short interest list for Microsoft stock.
